Years of

Who We Are

Study Abroad With EduCrest Hub
Best Education Consultant in Islamabad

We are the best education consultants in Islamabad, with the foundation back in 2016. Our international education services aim to guide and assist students in studying abroad. We connect students with top-rated universities across the UK, Malaysia, France, Ireland, Italy, Turkey, etc. Besides, our study consultants help with university and course selection, admission processing, study visa, interview preparation, and others. With 150+ institutions on board, we offer you a promising future by providing students the confidence to study abroad.

More Details
Reach Your Dream Destination

Get the Right Help

Discover how our best education consultants in Islamabad simplify your journey to study abroad. In short, from understanding complex processes to achieving your academic goals, we provide comprehensive support at every step. So, explore a world of academic opportunities and courses according to your interest.

Apply Now

Countries We Offer

International Study Destinations

Education

Study in UK

UK

United Kingdom offers you world-class education and ample professional aspects. You have a variety of study programs and can do part-time work.

United Kingdom offers you world-class education and ample professional aspects. You have a variety of study programs and can do part-time work.

Study in France

France

The most preferred international country for education. With a matchless culture, a high education system, and diverse programs, it attracts many students.

The most preferred international country for education. With a matchless culture, a high education system, and diverse programs, it attracts many students.

Study in Cyprus

Cyprus

Renowned study destination and an emerging hub for international students. Known for its rich cultural heritage, affordable education, and world-class universities.

Renowned study destination and an emerging hub for international students. Known for its rich cultural heritage, affordable education, and world-class universities.

Study in Ireland

Ireland

One of Europe’s top study abroad destinations, renowned for its prestigious universities, cutting-edge research opportunities, and rich cultural heritage.

One of Europe’s top study abroad destinations, renowned for its prestigious universities, cutting-edge research opportunities, and rich cultural heritage.

Study in Malaysia

Malaysia

Go-to destination for affordable but high educational standards. Get quality education in diverse and modern environment while studying in Malaysia.

Go-to destination for affordable but high educational standards. Get quality education in diverse and modern environment while studying in Malaysia.

Study in UAE

UAE

A well-developed country with rich cultural diversity and a quality education system offering multiple program options. It has student-friendly visa policies.

A well-developed country with rich cultural diversity and a quality education system offering multiple program options. It has student-friendly visa policies.

Study Abroad, Visa Services, & Beyond

Our Exclusive Services

Find Us

Our professional guidance and support are not limited to university admission and visas, but we also help with visit visas and career counselling. We give you the ways to support yourself financially while studying abroad. Moreover, our expert education consultants in Islamabad help you with university and embassy interview preparation. Also, certified English teachers coach you to score higher in English proficiency tests, including IELTS, TOEFL, PTE, Language Cert, Duolingo, and others. So, with our assistance, you can travel, study, and build your career abroad hassle-free.

Visa Consultation

Services

Visa Consultation

Services

Sort the complexities of visa applications with ease. Get guidance and documentation support from expert visa consultants to secure your study and visit visa.

English Test Preparation

Services

English Test Preparation

Services

Get your desired score with our comprehensive english coaching services for IELTS, PTE, TOEFL, Language Cert, etc. Personalized training sessions & mock tests.

Interview Preparation

Interview Preparation

Services

Career Counseling

Career Counseling

Why Choose EduCrest Hub?

Expert Guidance

Our Best education consultants in Islamabad help you choose countries with spectacular study and work life. Moreover, we have a major success rate for visa applications and career selection.

Guaranteed Success

EduCrest Hub has expertise guiding multiple arenas, leading you to boundless opportunities. Additionally, from determining the country to application submission, we have got your back.

Personalized Approach

Our team of the best study abroad consultants in Islamabad understands your unique preferences. Therefore, we ensure that our guidance matches your career goals and personal preferences

Global Opportunities

EduCrest Hub has the best study consultants in Islamabad, which provide you with all the guidance to avail seamless and reliable opportunities for studying in the UK, UAE, and Malaysia

Need Guidance for Universities, Admission Processing, & Visa?

Get Assistance
Testimonials

What Our Students Say

Smooth & Efficient Service!…

“Got my visa, and everything worked out so well. The consultants guided me in course selection and producing a creative SOP for the UK and Dubai. I founded EduCrest Hub through my friend, and they appeared to be very professional in their work. They were humble and polite, from visiting their office in Islamabad to later conversations. Deeply impressed by their expertise.”

Ahmad Hassan, Pakistan

March 8, 2023

Recommendable!

“Year ago, I needed clarification about selecting my career abroad. And now I am studying in UAE. All happened with Educrest’s best education consultants in Islamabad. Spending money for the consultation was worth the effort and the service they provided me with at that time. Their guidance made everything so easy for me that I got my visa in less than a month.”    

Danish Khurshid, Pakistan

September 9, 2022

Thank You Educrest!…

“While searching for universities to study in the UK, I was confused and helpless. Then, after visiting multiple education consultants in Islamabad, I came across EduCrest. Their experts guided me through the application process and helped me choose the right university. Moreover, they also helped me pick courses that aligned with my interests and made my admission process seamless.”

Sheraz Ali, Pakistan

February 3, 2022

Highly Recommended!…

“Had a great experience with EduCrest Hub. For me, it’s the most competent firm for study abroad consultation. Their experts helped me through the process, from finding the right place to application processing. Moreover, they also provided visa application assistance for the UAE. Now, I can say that they are my career makers and choosing them was the best decision ever.”

Sehr Riaz, Pakistan

February 3, 2018
Register Now!

Get Educational Consultation Now!

If you can’t attend in person, don’t worry! We offer online Educational Consultation services & English coaching for students across Pakistan. Put your details in the form to register and get expert study abroad consultation. Get started right away!
